reviewText: Totally exceeded expectations, instant favorite for my daughter, love the Max & Ruby series, instant classics, easy to sit through over and over, only thing to wonder is where are the parents? always alone or with Grandma.

Episodes on Berry Bunny Adventures:

Grandma's Berry Patch, Ruby's Bunny Scout Banner, Ruby's Detective Agency

Ruby is picking berries for Grandma's surprise recipe, but Max is more interested in eating them! Max's mischief "helps" Ruby and Louise make the perfect Bunny Scout Parade banner. When Mrs. Quack goes missing, Detective Ruby and Assistant Max take up the case!

Surprise Ruby, Ruby's Birthday Party, Ruby's Birthday Presents

Max's birthday surprise for Ruby aren't exactly the kind of surprise she had in mind. There are lots of things to do at Ruby's birthday party, but Max only wants to eat cake. Max uses the wrapping paper from Ruby's birthday presents to wrap his own special gift.

Ruby's Safari, Max's Mud Bath, Max's Lost Lizard

On a backyard safari for exotic creatures, Ruby and Louise find plenty of....Max's toys. Ruby and Louise want to give Max a beauty treatment, but he prefers a natural mud bath! Ruby and Louise's color changing chameleon is on the loose, much to Max's delight.

Ruby Riding Hood, Max And The Beanstalk, The Froggy Prince

Little Red Ruby Hood needs to get by the Big Max Wolf on her way to Grandma's house! Max doesn't like beans - until he hears Ruby's story of Max and the Beanstalk! In this bunny tale, find out if princess Ruby and Froggy Max live "hoppily" ever after.

I bought this DVD for my 20 month old daughter. It was a great value.  I received it before the estimated delivery date and the seller gave me a quick response to a question I had.  I have recommended this seller to friends and family.
Being Max & Ruby fans, this video is very entertaining for my kids.  I love the values exposed in the episodes.  Max's Lost Lizard is a favorite episode on this video.  Very good buy!
Our three year old loves this.  It has some of her favorites and some that we had not seen before.
This video contains more of what we've come to expect from Max and Ruby...great wholesome entertainment for the kids.
My grandchildren love Max and Ruby, as do I.
Great show for kidds
Very good condition thank you
My two toddlers love this show and it the perfect amount of time length on the dvd for longer car rides.
Granddaughter loves  this book
My 4 year old grandson loves this dvd! Great for kids and adults, too!
the kids love max and ruby
Kid loves it
Peace of mind in these cartoons...
works great. good seller

Love Max & Ruby! My children found this DVD very entertaining. 97 minutes long.
Episodes: Grandma's Berry Patch/ Ruby's Bunny Scout Banner/ Ruby's Detective Agency
Surprise Ruby/ Ruby's Birthday Party/ Ruby's Birthday Present
Ruby's Safari/ Max's Mud Bath/ Max's Lost Lizard
Ruby Riding Hood/ Max & the Beanstalk/ The Froggy Prince
Love anything/everything Max and Ruby.  Have shared them with all three of my grandsons when they were very young.
Works perfectly!  In brand new condition.
GREAT
everything great

Compared to the high energy cartoons, like Wow! Wow! Wubbzy!, that usually leads to high energy kids bouncing off the wall. Max and Ruby is a refreshing change of pace that is calm and relaxing, and can still keep kids entertained similarly to that of louder/brighter cartoons.
My daughter loves this movie!
My daughter love Max and Ruby she watches this video all day everyday. And she watches it in the car all the time.
Max and Ruby are great.  My daughter loves all of their shows and the price n this was great!  I will be buying more.
My kids love this DVD, I'm gonna have to buy a few more of Max & Ruby DVDs! We've barely had it for a few days and they watch it about 2 times a day!

EXCELLENT VIDEO FOR CHILDREN AND MY GRANDDAUGHTER LOVES IT!!!!!!!!! I HAVE PURCHASED SEVERAL OF THESE FOR HER AND THEY AREN'T VIOLENT AND THEY TEACH GOOD LESSONS FOR CHILDREN AS WELL AS ENTERTAIN!!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THESE DVD'S!!!!!
I enjoy with my grandson the further tales of Max and Ruby the bunnies. This is one of Ethan's favorites.

My granddaughter loves them! Very calm and informative characters. Max is the younger brother and is a bit mischievous. Ruby is the big sister who guides Max in the right direction. They also visit their grandma who gives both children love and affection.
Instead of the DVD ordered, "Berry Bunny Adventures," I received "Max & Ruby's Perfect Pumpkin," which is OK but not what I ordered.
A nice movie collection for max and.ruby lovers...my daughter has a thing for little red riding.hood so she loves max wolf...this is a favorite in.our house
Our son loves Max and Ruby. The program is a great teaching tool of how to ask for things and talk to people without being rude.
Max and Ruby are always fun to watch and very educational too. We even find ourselves watching these wonderful video's.

Very good stories and very entertaining for my toddler.
She can sit and watch for hours and actively engages with the stories.
Very Clean and watchable unlike some of the Goofy tv shows like Sponge Bob that makes you feel like your a crackhead for watching.
Any Max and Ruby movie is my granddaughter's favorite!  She never tires of watching it over and over and over!
I personally have only seen it once, but it got rave reviews from the younger set. The parentals like it, too.

Always love Ruby and Max, but love Max best.  Nice calm show and Max and his attitude just crack me up.  You can practically hear him humph when Ruby tells him to do something that he does not care to do.
My little guy loves this DVD.  He said he likes it better than the Max and Ruby Easter one, which was his favourite before.
This was for the grandson and he enjoys it.  If he's happy I'm happy.  Can't wait to see who's next!!!
My son loves Max and Ruby.  He gets a kick out watching Max do silly things! Love these cartoons! Recommend
My 3 year old grandson loves Max and Ruby.  Great DVD.  Contains shows that we have not seen on TV before.
Bought this because my daughter loves the show and it was at a great price.  A lot of episodes on the disc itself.  Highly recommended.
MY GRANDDAUGHTER IS 9  AND TIL THIS DAY SHE STILL WATCHES MAX AND RUBY THEY ARE AS SHE SAYS HER CHILLAXING MOVIES.  SO I NOW ORDER THESE AS GIFTS FOR OTHER YOUNG VIEWERS.
although walmart has max and ruby movies for 5.00, I purchased this for just over 6 including shipping. There were no scratches on the disc and the case looked really good as well.
Max and Ruby is a great video for children.  It is simple and sweet unlike many cartoons today.

Max and Ruby is very popular with the little ones, tight now it's a toss up between Max and Ruby and Dora.  I assume my granddaughter likes it as much as all the other ones I purchased for her on Amazon.com
